mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Illustrated Poyglot Family Bible
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family bible with family obituaties. Several newspaper clippings are pasted inside the bible as well as some cards, notes and other documents. Births, Marriages, and Deaths pages are in the back of thebible.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bible
Obituraries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
